about_the_game:
"My gaze locks onto the forever upwards gaping maw of the abyss. God damn the sun, for it carelessly shines ever brighter than my dwindling hope of escaping this cancer of a labyrinth. It grows, it breathes, slowly. I fear the descent, for I know, Something Wicked Lies Beneath."

Something Wicked Lies Beneath is a roguelite horror game, where you mysteriously wake up after dying in the metal halls of.... somewhere.




Explore the randomized labyrinth, get a feel of your sorroundings before engaging with your objectives.





Retrieve the battery and drag it to the starting room. Beware, once this is done, there is no going back. You will be under constant pressure by your need to manage your oxygen, heartrate, and having to manually vent CO2.




Complete your listed randomized objectives. By now, the constant pressure surges as the labyrinth will begin playing mind games on you while you are harassed by the denizens from below.




Dying in this labyrinth is a garuntee, whether its from oxygen loss, encounter with an enemy, or other causes, It's just a matter of if you've completed the objectives that determines your "victory".





Once you die, you lose your progress ( unless you "won" ), repeat it over and over and over again.
Don't get too comfortable, there may be unexpected variations between runs.


List of key features
  • Over 7 enemy types
  • 5 objective types with randomized parameters to keep things fresh
  • Variations in the hallways and rooms
  • An original soundtrack comprising of unnervingly out of place Smooth Jazz
  • Unexpected variance in world generation
  • Many many small details designed to gaslight you
  • Multiple rooms with plenty of enviornmental storytelling
  • Resource management involving heartrate and oxygen
  • Claustrophobia inducing hallways randomly generated to connect rooms
  • A strict run timer that you can only speed up
  • In-world UI representing vitals
  • Immersive in-helmet distortion filter

name: Something Wicked Lies Beneath
short_description: Explore the randomly segmented structures of your nightmares in this roguelike psychological horror game. Be strategic and efficient while completing randomized objectives with very limited oxygen, all while being hunted by whatever is down there with you. Many mysteries await your presence.
